titleStmt.title: Pambotanologia. Sive Enchiridion botanicum. Or A compleat herball containing the summe of what hath hitherto been published either by ancient or moderne authors both Galenicall and chymicall, touching trees, shrubs, plants, fruits, flowers, &c. In an alphabeticall order: wherein all that are not in the physick garden in Oxford are noted with asterisks. Shewing their place, time, names, kindes, temperature, vertues, use, dose, danger and antidotes. Together with an [brace] introduction to herbarisme, &c. appendix of exoticks. Universall index of plants: shewing what grow wild in England. / By Robert Lovell St. C.C. Ox.
titleStmt.author: Lovell, Robert, 1630?-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Hall, for Ric. Davis.,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters; the words "Introduction .. England." are bracketed together.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
